_comment: 🏥 MedFlow - Package Configuration - 💡 AI Agent Guidance: Before modifying this file, please review MedFlow/BRAND_IDENTITY.md, DEVELOPMENT_GUIDE.md, and FEATURES_DOCUMENTATION.md to ensure your work aligns with MedFlow's professional medical standards. No enforcement - just helpful guidance! 🚀
name: medflow

scripts.build:validate: npm run build && npm run quality:performance
scripts.quality:pre-commit: npm run quality:code && npm run quality:functionality
scripts.quality:pre-merge: npm run quality:all && npm run test
scripts.quality:pre-deploy: npm run build:validate && npm run quality:all
scripts.docs:read: echo '💡 MedFlow Documentation Reminder:' && echo '📚 README.md - Project overview and navigation' && echo '🎨 BRAND_IDENTITY.md - Brand guidelines and requirements' && echo '🔧 DEVELOPMENT_GUIDE.md - Technical standards and architecture' && echo '📚 FEATURES_DOCUMENTATION.md - Feature guides and setup' && echo '🤖 AI_AGENT_COMPLIANCE_REGISTRY.md - Compliance tracking (optional)'
scripts.docs:brand: echo '🎨 MedFlow Brand Guidelines:' && echo '📚 Read: MedFlow/BRAND_IDENTITY.md' && echo '💡 Contains: 7 sacred brand colors, voice, tone, target audience' && echo '⏱️  Reading time: ~5-7 minutes'
scripts.docs:dev: echo '🔧 MedFlow Development Guide:' && echo '📚 Read: MedFlow/DEVELOPMENT_GUIDE.md' && echo '💡 Contains: Component architecture, design system, best practices' && echo '⏱️  Reading time: ~8-10 minutes'
scripts.docs:features: echo '📚 MedFlow Features Documentation:' && echo '📚 Read: MedFlow/FEATURES_DOCUMENTATION.md' && echo '💡 Contains: All features, setup guides, troubleshooting' && echo '⏱️  Reading time: ~6-8 minutes'
